title: Scandal Appreciation with Bomani Jones
description:
Bomani Jones joins Spencer, Holly, and Jason for a discussion of
Banner Society and The Right Time’s series on how money and college football players meet
Bobby Petrino wearing Sugar Bowl gear to his motorcycle crash presser
Texas A&M and how you can avoid wearing a uniform by just getting a dog
Which schools have never tried cheating
